def long_jump():
    turn_left()
    move()
    while wall_on_right():
        move()
    turn_right()
    move()
    turn_right()
    while front_is_clear():
        move()
    turn_left()

# Hurdle 4
while not at_goal():
    if not wall_in_front():
        move()
    else:
        long_jump()
